title: Person of Interest: Root VS Martine Rousseau
author: POI Fights
comment: I will go to the grave saying I ship root and shaw but I have to admit there was sexual tension between Martine and Root
That's hot the way Martine shot and killed one of her own men just to try to kill Root.
Root's fight scenes are the worst scenes of the show. Even her two gun action, which I've never enjoyed, is much better!
It's really a shame that Martine was used as only a piece of that unneeded love story between Shaw and Root. She wasn't a helpless woman as shown in this episode.
description: Fight Scene from S04 X 21: Asylum
